description:
Writing > Improving Sentences

Part or all of the following sentence is underlined; beneath the sentence are five ways of phrasing the underlined material. Select the option that produces the best sentence. If you think the original phrasing produces a better sentence than any of the alternatives, select choice A.

Their part of the reconstruction process that followed the Second World War, the nations of Western Europe took steps toward achieving greater political and economic integration.

(A) Their

(B) The

(C) It was

(D) As

(E) On 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

description:
"Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world." -Harriet Tubman每个伟大的梦想始于会做梦的人。永远记住，你有力量、耐心和热情去获得成功改变世界。”——哈莉特·塔布曼

"Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow." -Anthony J. D'Angelo“激发对学习的热情。这样你将永远不会止步不前。”——安东尼·德安杰洛

"Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you." -Oprah Winfrey“激情是能量。感觉一下专注做让你兴奋之事的力量吧。”——奥普拉·温弗瑞

"If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins." -Benjamin Franklin“如果激情促你前进，让理智控制情绪。”——本杰明·富兰克林

"It is obvious that we can no more explain a passion to a person who has never experienced it than we can explain light to the blind."--T. S. Eliot“很明显，我们不能向没有经历过激情的人解释它，就像不能跟盲人解释光。”——托马斯·斯特尔那斯·艾略特

"Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate." -Jon Bon Jovi“没有什么跟激情一样重要。无论你想在生活中做什么，带着激情做。”——乔恩·邦·乔维

"You can't fake passion." -Barbara Corcoran“你无法装出有热情的样子。”——芭芭拉·柯克兰

"You have to be burning with "an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right." If you're not passionate enough from the start, you'll never stick it out." ― Steve Jobs“你必须对‘某个想法、某个问题，或纠正错误’有热情。如果你一开始就不够热情，那你永远不会坚持到底。”——史蒂夫·乔布斯

"Yes, in all my research, the greatest leaders looked inward and were able to tell a good story with authenticity and passion." -Deepak Chopra“是的，在我所有的研究中，最伟大的领导人都会反省自身，并且能够带着真诚和激情讲好故事。”——狄巴克·乔布拉

"If you feel like there's something out there that you're supposed to be doing, if you have a passion for it, then stop wishing and just do it." -Wanda Skyes“如果你觉得自己应该在做某件事情，如果你对这件事有热情，那就别再想了赶快做吧。”——旺达·赛克斯

"If you don't love what you do, you won't do it with much conviction or passion." -Mia Hamm“如果你不热爱自己的工作，就不会带着信念和激情完成它。”——米娅·哈姆

"There is no end. There is no beginning. There is only the passion of life." -Federico Fellini“没有结束。没有开始。只有对生命的热情。”——佛德理哥·费里尼

生活正能量：热情的人们10个好习惯

将爱好转化成工作热情：如何做自己爱的事情赚钱？

description:
沪江英乐：爱尔兰流行天团 Boyzone 最新单曲《Light Up the Night》录影带！还是那个年轻的声音，一起伴随男孩地带的声音回到过去。伴随着他们那么久了，声音还是那么熟悉那么动听。

【Boyzone 最新单曲《Light Up the Night》录影带】

歌词：

Before you I was a church
Without a nickel or a prayer
Before you I was a soul
Without a lighter… held up in the air

Don’t know if I ever could thank you
Near enough for the love since we met
For every sunrise and sunset

(Chorus – part 1)
We light up the night
The spark in our eyes
Is more than enough
To steal the dark from the skies

(Chorus – part 2)
We light up the night
Burnt forever young
You know two stars shine brighter than one
We light up the night

Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up

Before you I was apart
With no glitter on the floor
Before you I was less calm
With no hope
Kissin` me out the door

You`re a dream I was always dreaming
Can`t believe I`m finally awake
Holding you til the day break

(Chorus – part 1)
We light up the night
The spark in our eyes
Is more than enough
To steal the dark from the skies

(Chorus – part 2)
We light up the night
Burnt forever young
You know two stars shine brighter than one
We light up the night

Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up the night
Light up, light up

(Chorus – part 1)
We light up the night
The spark in our eyes
Is more than enough
To steal the dark from the skies

(Chorus – part 2)
We light up the night
Burnt forever young
You know two stars shine brighter than one
We light up the night
